actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to direct the President to establish a Liaison Office of the United States government on Taiwan with responsibility for representing United States interests on Taiwan, such Liaison Office to be comparable to the Liaison Office which the United States maintained in Peking prior to United States recognition of the People's Republic of China.

summary.text: Directs the President to establish and maintain a liaison office on Taiwan.

titles.title: A bill to direct the President to establish a Liaison Office of the United States government on Taiwan with responsibility for representing United States interests on Taiwan, such Liaison Office to be comparable to the Liaison Office which the United States maintained in Peking prior to United States recognition of the People's Republic of China.
